00037 bool V1751Board::Init( long     vme_handle)
00038 {
00039         if( !V17XXBoard::Init( vme_handle))
00040                 return false;
00041 
00042         // ADC Calibration
00043         UINT8 ch_msk= 0x00;
00044         //for( int i= 0; i< (UINT8)this->m_channel_array.GetCount(); i++)
00045         //{
00046         //      ch_msk|= 1<< i;
00047         //}
00048         ch_msk= GetChEnableMsk();
00049 
00050         // Prompt even channel disconnect here
00051         //if( this->m_is_des_mode)
00052         //      wxMessageBox( wxT("CAENScope is about to perform an ADCs' calibration!\nPlease make sure that even channels' signals are disconnected "), wxT("Warning"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_WARNING  );
00053         wxMessageBox( wxT("CAENScope is about to perform an ADCs' calibration!\nPlease make sure that channels' signals are disconnected "), wxT("Warning"), wxOK | wxCENTRE | wxICON_WARNING  );
00054 
00055         if( !cvt_V1724_adc_calib( (cvt_V1724_data* )this->m_p_data, ch_msk))
00056         {
00057                 wxLogError( _T( "Error during ADCs' calibration\n"));
00058         }       
00059         if( !cvt_V1724_software_reset( (cvt_V1724_data* )this->m_p_data))
00060         {
00061                 wxLogError( _T( "Error during software reset .\n"));
00062         }       
00063 
00064         if( !cvt_V1724_set_des_mode( (cvt_V1724_data* )this->m_p_data, this->m_is_des_mode? TRUE: FALSE))
00065         {
00066                 wxLogError( _T( "Error during cvt_V1724_set_des_mode execution \n"));
00067         }       
00068         // Repeat some initialization after software reset
00069 
00070         //
00071         // Write trigger mode
00072         if( !this->WriteTriggerMode( false))
00073                 return false;
00074         // 
00075         // Front Panel IO
00076         if( !this->SetFrontPanelIO( this->m_p_app_settings->m_use_TTL))
00077                 return false;
00078 
00079         return true;
00080 }
00081

00083 bool V1751Board::GetBoardMemory( UINT32 &num_ksamples_per_channel)
00084 {
00085         UINT32 reg_value32= 0;
00086 
00087         // 
00088         // read the board id
00089         if( !cvt_read( this->m_p_data, CVT_V1724_BOARD_INFO_ADD, &reg_value32, CVT_V1724_BOARD_INFO_AM, CVT_V1724_BOARD_INFO_DATA_SIZE))
00090         {
00091                 return false;
00092         }
00093         num_ksamples_per_channel= CVT_V1724_GET_BRDINF_BLOCK_SIZE_KW( reg_value32);
00094 
00095         // HACK rivedere qui V1751Board::GetBoardMemory
00096         num_ksamples_per_channel/= 2;
00097         num_ksamples_per_channel*= 7;           // 10 bit data
00098         return true;
00099 }
